props.align: Applies the [align-items](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/align-items) css property. Available options are: **start**, **center**, **end**, **baseline** and **stretch**.
props.alignSm: Changes the **align-items** property on small and greater breakpoints.
props.alignMd: Changes the **align-items** property on medium and greater breakpoints.
props.alignLg: Changes the **align-items** property on large and greater breakpoints.
props.alignXl: Changes the **align-items** property on extra large and greater breakpoints.
props.alignContent: Applies the [align-content](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/align-content) css property. Available options are: **start**, **center**, **end**, **space-between**, **space-around** and **stretch**.
props.alignContentSm: Changes the **align-content** property on small and greater breakpoints.
props.alignContentMd: Changes the **align-content** property on medium and greater breakpoints.
props.alignContentLg: Changes the **align-content** property on large and greater breakpoints.
props.alignContentXl: Changes the **align-content** property on extra large and greater breakpoints.
props.justify: Applies the [justify-content](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/justify-content) css property. Available options are: **start**, **center**, **end**, **space-between** and **space-around**.
props.justifySm: Changes the **justify-content** property on small and greater breakpoints.
props.justifyMd: Changes the **justify-content** property on medium and greater breakpoints.
props.justifyLg: Changes the **justify-content** property on large and greater breakpoints.
props.justifyXl: Changes the **justify-content** property on extra large and greater breakpoints.
